translation.en: [narrator] On the Motherworld,
one thousand kings ruled unchallenged in succession.
translation.ko: 그 어떤 도전도 받지 않고 1천 세대를 이어갔다

translation.en: But in the royal bloodline's lust for power,
translation.ko: 하지만 권력을 향한 왕실의 탐욕이 지나쳐

translation.en: they consumed everything upon their planet.
The Realm marched its armies into the vastness of space,
conquering everything in its path.
The glory of the Motherworld seemed without end
until the treachery of an assassin's blade struck down the King and Queen,
translation.ko: 한 암살자가 휘두른 배신의 칼날이 왕과 왕비를 향하면서

translation.en: severing the royal bloodline forever.
In the chaotic aftermath of the King's death,
several conquered planets on the edge of the Motherworld's reach
translation.ko: 마더월드의 손이 미치지 않는 식민지 행성 여러 곳에서

translation.en: began to whisper of revolution.
A senator named Balisarius used the opportunity to seize power,
translation.ko: 발리사리우스라는 의원이 기회를 틈타 권력을 잡고

translation.en: declaring himself regent.
As a show of strength, he sent his most brutal commander
translation.ko: 자신의 힘을 보여주려 휘하에서 가장 악랄한 사령관을

translation.en: into the outer reaches of the Motherworld's dominion
translation.ko: 마더월드의 세력이 미치지 않는 변두리로 보내며

translation.en: to find and crush without mercy
translation.ko: 스스로를 저항 세력이라 일컫는 이들을 찾아

translation.en: those who would call themselves rebel.
[man] Kora. Kora!
I thought you were finished.
Everyone's up in the Longhouse.
-These are my last rows and I'll be done. -All right.
Okay.
Den was asking where you were.
He and his brother got a big snow-elk, male.
translation.ko: 덴 형제가 큰 수컷 스노엘크를 잡았거든

translation.en: He wanted you to see it before he dressed it.
Why was he asking for me?
Well, you know, because he's…
I, I just thought… I just thought…
You thought?
-Move up. -[uraki groans]
It's been a while since we've had fresh meat. Forgot how good it is.
translation.ko: 신선한 고기 진짜 오랜만이네요 이 맛을 잊고 살았다니

translation.en: [man] Den said they saw the summer herds returning.
translation.ko: 덴이 스노엘크 무리가 돌아오는 걸 봤다더라

translation.en: Maybe three days' ride away.
-He was asking for you. -[Kora] I heard.
And, yes, it's quite impressive.
Which one? The animal?
Or…
Or the hunter?
My people,
it is my duty as the head of this community
to remind you that the gods of the harvest demand a tribute.
[villager] Yeah.
[leader] An offering.
But we all know it is the thrusting of hips…
…and the loud sounds of pleasure that summon the seedlings to sprout.
translation.ko: 쾌락의 비명도 좀 들려야 씨앗에서 싹이 나오지요

translation.en: -[villagers laugh] Yeah! -[chuckles]
So make love tonight.
For the harvest. For the very food we eat.
translation.ko: 수확을 위하여 우리가 먹을 식량을 위하여

translation.en: -Yeah! -[villagers] Yeah!
For the gods!
Let's have some music.
Some music to get us in the mood.
Den is a good man.
You should be asleep.
He's the best hunter among us.
And a loyal friend.
Have you thought of a more permanent relationship?
translation.ko: 좀 더 단단한 관계로 발전하고 싶진 않니?

translation.en: I know that he's amenable to the idea.
He's asked me himself.
It's easy between us.
Does it have to be more than that?
It's just, uh…
That would be your last step to becoming a full member of this community.
translation.ko: 너도 이 공동체의 완벽한 일원이 될 수 있겠지

translation.en: I'm telling you, this is home now.
I want that to be true.
You know,
the two seasons I've spent here have given me happiness
translation.ko: 여기서 지낸 두 해 동안 행복했어요

translation.en: that I don't deserve.
But understand, I am a child of war.
To truly love and be loved, I…
I don't know if I'm capable of either.
translation.ko: 전 둘 다 못 할 것 같아요

translation.en: The very idea of love, of… family was beaten out of me.
translation.ko: 제겐 사랑에 대한 생각도 가족에 대한 생각도 남아 있지 않아요

translation.en: I was taught that love is weakness.
And I…
I don't know how that will ever change.
You should get some rest.
Yeah.
[woman] I noticed you left early last night.
Were you tired?
[Kora] That's right. I thought I'd make it an early night.
I thought you were doing your part for the harvest.
translation.ko: 난 또 수확에 힘쓰고 있는 줄 알았지

translation.en: Because as I walked home, I passed Den's house.
-That's what it sounded like. -[Kora laughs]
Sam, I don't know what you're talking about.
[Sam] I think you do.
What do you think they want?
Everything.
I don't care what the potential upside might be,
translation.ko: 혹시 모를 좋은 일 같은 거 난 관심 없어

translation.en: a warship hanging over our land cannot be good.
translation.ko: 머리 위에 함선이 떠 있는데 좋을 게 대체 뭐지?

translation.en: That's your problem. Your first reaction is always fear.
translation.ko: 매번 겁부터 내고 보니까 문제란 겁니다

translation.en: The Motherworld has deep pockets.
I'm simply saying maybe we can get a better price
from our friends in low orbit there,
rather than having to deal with the cutthroats in Providence,
selling our grain to God only knows.
translation.ko: 근본도 없는 놈들한테 파는 것보단 낫겠죠

translation.en: Don't act like we don't know you've been selling our surplus grain
translation.ko: 우리가 모르는 것 같아? 네가 저들의 적한테 잉여 수확물을 팔고 있잖아

translation.en: to the enemies of that ship up there.
translation.ko: 네가 저들의 적한테 잉여 수확물을 팔고 있잖아

translation.en: I wonder what they would say if they found out where our excess went last year.
translation.ko: 작년 잉여 수확물의 행방을 알면 저들이 뭐라고 할까?

translation.en: Well, I'm no revolutionary.
They offered the best price. I don't care about their cause.
translation.ko: 가격만 잘 쳐주면 신념 따위 관심 없다고요

translation.en: Obviously.
Sindri, I don't have a side, only this community.
translation.ko: 신드리, 전 누구 편도 아니에요 그저 이 공동체에만 충직할 뿐입니다

translation.en: That's my only loyalty.
And I say we start by showing them goodwill, not fear.
translation.ko: 전 공포심이 아닌 선의를 보여줘야 한다고 생각합니다

translation.en: That we are their partners, not their adversaries, right?
translation.ko: 적이 아니라 파트너로서 공생하자는 거죠, 안 그래요?

translation.en: Did you say "partner," Gunnar?
I did. Is that a problem?
That ship does not represent prosperity.
translation.ko: 저것들은 다 같이 잘살자고 온 게 아니야

translation.en: Its purpose is to destroy, to subjugate, to enslave.
-Partnership is not in its vocabulary. -[villagers gasp]
Give them what they ask for.
But volunteer nothing about how fertile this land is.
translation.ko: 우리 땅이 얼마나 비옥한지 알게 하면 절대 안 돼요

translation.en: And hope they leave before digging too deep
into who Gunnar sold last year's grain to.
-Right. -I've heard enough. We volunteer nothing.
translation.ko: - 너무하네 - 이제 그만 절대 먼저 제안하지 않는다

translation.en: Is that clear?
[villager] They're here!
They're coming! They're coming! They're coming!
Hello. I am Sindri, father of this village.
translation.ko: 안녕하십니까 저는 이 마을의 촌장 신드리입니다

translation.en: Welcome.
I'm Admiral Atticus Noble.
Loyal representative of the slain King.
I welcome you to his warm embrace.
Please, father, tell me about this beautiful village.
translation.ko: 부탁합니다 이 아름다운 마을 얘길 듣고 싶군요

translation.en: Walk with me up to our Longhouse.
We can have a cup of ale and I will tell you about life here.
translation.ko: 에일 한잔 함께하며 저희 삶에 대해 말씀드리겠습니다

translation.en: Oh. Sounds perfect. Lead the way.
[Sindri] We've carved out a simple life here.
And we take pride in the love of our community,
and the hard work it takes to survive here.
[Noble] Your people seem healthy and well-fed.
As their leader, much of that prosperity must be credited to you.
translation.ko: 이렇게 잘살고 있는 건 지도자의 능력이겠지요

translation.en: No, we are a community. The credit is no one person's.
translation.ko: 저희는 공동체이니 한 사람만의 능력은 아니죠

translation.en: Oh, I know that in the best of times, the credit's shared,
but when the stores are empty, you know where the responsibility falls.
translation.ko: 창고가 비면 누구한테 화살이 돌아가는지 알잖아요

translation.en: The weight of the leader, I suppose.
So you… you understand the feeling of, like, a father,
the need to feed your children, yes?
translation.ko: 자식들을 먹여 살려야 하는 아비 말이오

translation.en: I was hoping that your land and the people of Veldt might help
translation.ko: 이 마을의 땅과 벨트의 주민들이 숨어 있는 소규모 혁명 분자들 색출에 힘을 좀 보태줬으면 합니다

translation.en: as we search for a small band of revolutionaries hiding in this system.
translation.ko: 숨어 있는 소규모 혁명 분자들 색출에 힘을 좀 보태줬으면 합니다

translation.en: Who my commander, the Regent Balisarius, bid me find and bring to justice.
translation.ko: 발리사리우스 섭정 왕께서 내게 그들을 처단하라 명하셨소

translation.en: We are humble farmers,
far removed from the politics of the Motherworld.
-[ax clatters] -And still you can serve. Hmm.
The rebels we seek have been attacking our supply ports.
translation.ko: 우리 보급항들이 반역자들에게 공격을 당했지 뭐요

translation.en: Led by a woman named Devra Bloodaxe, and her brother Darrian.
translation.ko: 데브라와 다리안 블러드액스 그 남매가 이끄는 무리요

translation.en: Their capture's inevitable.
However, it's taken longer than anticipated,
and we found ourselves admittedly low on stores.
And as you know or may have heard, an army runs on its stomach.
translation.ko: 아마 그런 말 들어봤겠지만 군대는 밥심인데 말이지요

translation.en: I was thinking of a partnership, where you supply us with food.
Whatever you have to spare, of course.
In exchange, you're compensated at…
Let's call it triple the market value, shall we?
With that windfall, you'll be able to buy plenty of harvesters, robots,
translation.ko: 그 정도면 농기계라든가 로봇을 많이 사들일 수 있고

translation.en: and won't have to do this difficult work by hand.
translation.ko: 손에 흙 묻혀가며 힘들게 일 안 해도 될 텐데

translation.en: We believe that doing the work by hand connects us to the land
translation.ko: 저희는 손에 흙을 묻혀 땅과 교감하고

translation.en: and honors these sacred fields that give us life.
translation.ko: 우리에게 생명을 주는 신성한 땅에 경의를 표합니다

translation.en: [Noble] There's peace of mind knowing that you're invaluable
translation.ko: 마더월드의 적을 뿌리 뽑는 중차대한 임무에

translation.en: in the important mission of rooting out enemies of the Motherworld.
translation.ko: 중요한 역할을 하면 마음의 평화를 얻을 텐데

translation.en: -[Sindri] It's quite a proposal. -[Noble] Yes.
[Sindri] If only we had some surplus to offer.
translation.ko: 그런데 그건 잉여 수확이 있을 때 얘기죠

translation.en: You see, the land is rocky
and yields barely enough to feed ourselves.
translation.ko: 이곳 사람들 배도 제대로 못 채울 정도죠

translation.en: So, it is with sincere apologies that we must decline the offer.
However, we are grateful
translation.ko: 하지만 이토록 너그럽고 강한 군대의 보호를 받으니

translation.en: for the presence of such a benevolent and powerful protector.
translation.ko: 하지만 이토록 너그럽고 강한 군대의 보호를 받으니 얼마나 감사한지 모르겠습니다

translation.en: No surplus?
-None at all? -[chuckles]
But your land looks so fertile.
Your fields seem larger than what your population might need.
Of course, I understand how it might seem.
Yet the scale of the planting is evidence of the poor soil.
translation.ko: 하지만 경작 범위가 넓다는 건 토양이 척박하다는 반증이죠

translation.en: And our harsh winters only add to the short season.
Now, what do you say we share that cup of ale, eh?
Sorry.
It's just…
I mean, look at these beautiful people.
I can't imagine these glowing complexions are nourished by a barren field.
translation.ko: 척박한 땅이 내주는 것만으로 저런 윤기가 돌 수 있다니

translation.en: Now… who's the man or woman among you who oversees the harvest?
There must be one whose thumb is greener than the rest.
translation.ko: 농사에 더 능숙한 사람이 분명 있을 텐데요

translation.en: Someone?
[Gunnar] Yes, sir.
-[Noble] Ah. -That is me.
[Noble] Good.
Yes, I oversee the harvest.
Well, if these people trust you, then so do I.
Trying to understand how I could be so wrong about what this land could yield. That's all.
translation.ko: 왜 내 눈에만 이 땅이 비옥해 보이는지 알고 싶을 뿐이오

translation.en: Well, sir.
Sindri, our beloved father, is always looking out for the welfare of our village
translation.ko: 신드리는 사랑받는 촌장으로서 늘 마을 사람들의 안위를 살피십니다

translation.en: and so insists on keeping reserves in case of famine or drought,
translation.ko: 기근이나 가뭄을 대비해 예비 식량을 저장하라 당부하시죠

translation.en: which, as you know, is the responsibility of a leader.
[splutters] But we have been lucky these last few seasons.
translation.ko: 그런데 지난 몇 해 동안 꽤 운이 좋아서

translation.en: Our surplus has been more than we can store.
translation.ko: 저장하고도 남을 만큼 잉여 수확이 있었습니다

translation.en: So, there might be
a chance that we can spare a small amount.
translation.ko: 조금은 챙겨드릴 수 있을 것 같습니다

translation.en: Depending, of course, on the scale of your needs.
translation.ko: 필요로 하시는 양에 따라 좀 다르겠지만요

translation.en: Mmm. Good. Good.
Yeah, I mean, it's always wise to hold some in reserve, isn't it, father?
translation.ko: 그렇지 예비 식량을 챙기는 건 지혜로운 일이지요, 촌장

translation.en: Yep. Yep.
I am confused though.
Curious why you should have me believe this land could barely yield enough to feed your people.
translation.ko: 이곳 사람들 배도 다 못 채울 만큼 수확량이 적다고 한 이유가 뭘까?

translation.en: -Seems that wasn't entirely true. -[Gunnar] No, wait, wait.
Admiral, no one is trying to mislead you.
Sindri simply has a slightly more conservative view on reserves than I do.
translation.ko: 예비 식량 필요량에 대한 신드리의 생각이 저보다 좀 보수적인 것뿐이죠

translation.en: But we're both excited about a possible partnership.
translation.ko: 하지만 파트너로서 공생하길 바라는 마음은 같습니다

translation.en: Just bear in mind the reality of what we can supply.
translation.ko: 공급할 수 있는 양이 제한적이란 건 알아주십시오

translation.en: Father, who is this exactly?
-Uh… My… -[Sindri] He's of no consequence.
I have been empowered by my people to speak for them.
translation.ko: 모두를 대변할 자격을 갖춘 사람은 저입니다

translation.en: This man has no authority here.
You would be wise to ignore him.
translation.ko: 그자 말은 무시하시는 게 좋을 겁니다

translation.en: [Noble] Well… a rift.
It's not quite the idyllic community I'd first seen.
Father, if I may
offer you some advice when dealing with subordinates who need to be kept in place.
translation.ko: 충고 하나 하고 싶군요 주제 모르는 아랫것을 다루는 법에 대해서

translation.en: I find people can lose sight of the stakes and sometimes need a gentle reminder
translation.ko: 주제 파악을 못 할 때는 한 번씩 상기시켜 줘야 되거든

translation.en: of just how those with power deal with those without.
translation.ko: 힘 있는 자가 힘없는 자를 어떻게 다루는지

translation.en: [Sindri] Admiral.
Sindri…
Please.
-No, I… I would never… -It's fine.
-[nervously] I… -Let me show you what I mean.
[Sindri] Please.
Admiral.
[Gunnar] No, stop!
[villager] No!
[Gunnar] What did you do?
When can I expect my harvest?
I don't…
I said, tell me, partner, when I can expect my harvest.
translation.ko: 어서 말해, 파트너 식량은 언제 받을 수 있지?

translation.en: -Nine… nine weeks. -Very well.
In ten weeks, I shall return.
You shall have my 10,000 bushels prepared for my ship.
Twelve… We barely produce 12,000 bushels.
We'll starve to death.
I don't understand what you want.
Well, it's simple.
I want everything.
All right, listen up.
I need all of this gear moved to this big stone building.
translation.ko: 장비랑 짐 전부 저 큰 석조 건물로 옮긴다

translation.en: That should suit us for now.
Marcus, you're gonna help me evict the current residents from our new home.
translation.ko: 마커스 우리 숙소에 살고 있는 자들을 내보내러 가자고, 알겠지?

translation.en: Copy?
translation.ko: 우리 숙소에 살고 있는 자들을 내보내러 가자고, 알겠지?

translation.en: Copy you, boss.
Copy you.
Hello, everyone.
I am JC-1435 of the Mechanicas Militarium,
translation.ko: 저는 왕을 수호하는 메카니카 군 소속

translation.en: defender of the King.
Correction, of the slain King.
It is my honor to serve.
I'm Private Aris.
We're moving supplies to that building, if you wouldn't mind lending a hand.
translation.ko: 저 건물로 짐을 옮겨야 하는데 좀 도와줄래요?

translation.en: Thank you, Private Aris.
That falls perfectly into my protocols.
[Marcus] I'm talking to you, you dirty drain turtle. Come here.
translation.ko: 빨리 나가라잖아 거지 같은 게, 빨리 나와

translation.en: [shouts] The hell you waiting for? Get out, man!
Thank you.
Now, what in the name of the old gods are you looking at?
I'm sorry, I was just waiting to see if you needed some more water.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 물을 더 드시려나 궁금해서 그랬어요

translation.en: Some more water?
That's how I like 'em. Young, strong enough to put up a fight.
translation.ko: 맘에 드는군 어리고 발톱도 보일 줄 알고

translation.en: -Boss. -[commander] Hmm?
Look, they left us a Jimmy.
It's a Jimmy, man.
I didn't know we had any of those left.
All right, careful. The ground's uneven till you get to the bridge.
Thank you, Private Aris, but I believe I can manage.
translation.ko: 고맙습니다, 아리스 이병 별문제는 없을 겁니다

translation.en: [Marcus] They won't fight anymore.
What do you mean they won't fight anymore?
It's something in their programming.
Once the King was killed,
they just laid down their weapons and refused to fight.
Just watch, no matter what I do, he doesn't fight back.
translation.ko: 보십쇼 제가 뭘 어쩌든 절대 반격 안 할 겁니다

translation.en: [Marcus] Hey!
Careful with that stuff, you stupid machine.
translation.ko: 조심해서 들란 말이야 멍청한 기계 자식아!

translation.en: I'll turn you into scrap, you dumbshit. You hear me?
You're not hearing me.
[Aris] Hey! Stop.
What if I shoot you instead, huh?
I could kill you right now and no one would care.
translation.ko: 이 자리에서 널 죽여도 신경 쓸 사람 하나 없잖아

translation.en: -Would they? -[commander] That's enough.
What do you say? Wanna die?
What's it, huh?
Come on, boy.
I said, enough.
Get these crates into that house now, Private.
translation.ko: 이 상자들 저 건물로 옮겨라, 이병

translation.en: Yes, boss.
Are you malfunctioning?
No, sir.
Get up. Go to the river. Clean yourself.
The rest of you, stop staring.
Get back to work.
[Marcus] Get back to work, assholes.
[commander] That includes you, Marcus.
[soldier 1] You got it?
[Sam] Excuse me.
[JC-1435] Thank you. That is kind.
-You're a soldier? -Long ago.
Do you mind? I'm Sam.
[JC-1435] Please.
Tell me, Sam. Do you know the story of our slain King
and his beautiful daughter, the Princess Issa?
translation.ko: 그의 아름다운 딸 이사 공주의 이야기를 아시나요?

translation.en: I don't.
Well, you remind me of her.
In myth, she was called the Chalice or the Redeemer.
She was pueri salvatoris.
And even before she was born,
I and my brothers pledged everything we were,
translation.ko: 저와 제 형제들은 모든 걸 바치겠다 맹세했죠

translation.en: everything that dwells inside this metal skin,
translation.ko: 이 금속 껍데기 속의 모든 것을 바쳐

translation.en: to fight in her name.
So when word reached us on some distant battlefield
translation.ko: 그래서 어느 먼 전장에 있던 저희에게 연락이 날아들고

translation.en: that she, as prophesied, had been born of flesh and blood into our world,
translation.ko: 예언 내용대로 그분께서 이 세상에 와주셨다는 소식을 들었을 땐

translation.en: I felt a great warmth for the universe
and trusted that she was to usher in a new age of peace and compassion.
translation.ko: 그분께서 우릴 인도하시리라 믿었답니다 공감과 평화의 새 시대로

translation.en: And bring us home.
She was magic.
[JC-1435] Ah, yes. She was more than magic.
On the day of her coronation,
she, along with our honored King and Queen,
were assassinated in cold blood by those they trusted most.
translation.ko: 무자비하게 암살당하셨지요 가장 신뢰하셨던 자들의 손에요

translation.en: I fear we lost some measure of our honor since that betrayal.
translation.ko: 우린 그 배신의 날 이후로 명예를 잃은 것 같습니다

translation.en: I'm afraid our compassion, our kindness,
our very joy,
died with that young girl.
translation.ko: 그 어린 소녀와 함께 죽은 것 같아요

translation.en: I think it lives in you.
translation.ko: 모두 당신 안에 살아 있을 거예요

translation.en: This is your fault, Gunnar!
I didn't know that he would kill them.
Doesn't matter. He's dead now.
[villager 1] What about the soldiers? Next, it's gonna be the other house.
translation.ko: 남은 군인들은 어쩌죠? 곧 다른 집도 탐낼 텐데

translation.en: -[villager 2] I don't know. -Stop, please.
How about we bring in the crop and we fall on their mercy?
[villager 3] Yeah.
We make ourselves invaluable. They wouldn't be able to kill us.
translation.ko: - 맞아요 - 우리 실력을 보여주면 죽일 수 없을 거예요 우리가 필요할 테니까

translation.en: -They would need us. -He's right.
translation.ko: 죽일 수 없을 거예요 우리가 필요할 테니까 맞아요

translation.en: Farming, that is our skill that we can do, that they cannot.
translation.ko: 농사는 우리 능력이잖아요 우린 할 수 있고 저들은 못 해요

translation.en: If we show them how good we are, they will be forced to spare us.
translation.ko: 우리 실력을 보여주면 억지로라도 살려둘 거예요

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes. Yeah.
-Do we agree? Our work fights for us. -[all] Yes!
translation.ko: 다 동의합니까? 우리 무기는 농사예요 - 맞아요 - 동의합니다

translation.en: -Our work fights for us. Yes? -[villagers] Yes!
[Den] It's settled then.
-We show them how valuable we are. -[villager 3] Okay.
[Den] And when we have fulfilled our side of the deal,
they will be forced to rethink how much food they leave us.
translation.ko: 우리한테도 식량을 더 남겨줄 수밖에 없을 거예요

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
We can appeal to those gentlemen in the granary, appeal to their humanity.
translation.ko: 저장고에 머무는 군인들의 인정에 호소해 봅시다

translation.en: -[villager 3] Yeah. -Good.
So… it's running.
Would've thought you'd have had enough of that.
You heard them. They're delusional.
translation.ko: 들었잖아요 다들 망상에 빠져선 군인들이 자비를 베풀 거래요

translation.en: They think those soldiers will show mercy even after what they did to Sindri,
translation.ko: 다들 망상에 빠져선 군인들이 자비를 베풀 거래요 신드리한테 한 짓을 보고도요

translation.en: right in front of them.
When I found you in the wreckage of that ship,
I considered leaving you.
I was afraid you could bring trouble to us.
But do I for a moment regret bringing you into our lives?
translation.ko: 하지만 널 데려온 걸 한순간이라도 후회했을 것 같니?

translation.en: I do not.
You've become a part of us.
And yet, now you leave when we need you most.
translation.ko: 그런데 우리가 널 필요로 하니 네가 떠나려 하는구나

translation.en: When your people need you.
I can't.
You mean, you won't?
This place is already lost.
But what if that could change?
What if we did fight, not only us, but others?
-Who else would come here and fight? -Others! Others!
translation.ko: - 누가 와서 싸워줄 건데요? - 다른 이들이 있어!

translation.en: Others that have reason to hate all that the Motherworld represents.
translation.ko: 증오하는 이들이 있어 마더월드의 모든 것을

translation.en: Kora, you know this universe better than I.
translation.ko: 코라, 넌 나보다 이 우주를 잘 알잖니

translation.en: What if you could find the warriors that Noble seeks?
translation.ko: 그 제독이 쫓고 있는 전사들을 찾아보는 게 어떻겠니?

translation.en: The outlaws to fight alongside us?
translation.ko: 그 무법자들을 찾아 우리 편에 서게 해

translation.en: If I find warriors to fight for Veldt, I give the village hope.
translation.ko: 함께 싸워줄 전사들을 찾으면 마을 사람들은 희망을 갖겠죠

translation.en: If I give them hope, they fight and surely lose.
translation.ko: 희망을 주면 싸우다가 결국 질 거예요

translation.en: I won't have that blood on my hands.
Nor will I throw my life away the same as the rest of you.
translation.ko: 마을 사람들처럼 멍하니 삶을 뺏기기도 싫고요

translation.en: Check this.
Hey, water girl!
-[Marcus] Come here. -[Sam] What is it?
Did you need some more water?
Just a… a little water.
Stop it!
[Marcus] Or what?
-[Marcus yells] -[Sam shouting] Help! Help!
Please, help!
Help!
-Shut up! -Get off me!
-Help me! -[Marcus] Shut up!
[Sam] No. Please!
-[Marcus] Shut up. -Someone help me, please! Please, help!
translation.ko: 조용히 해! 누가 좀 도와줘요! 도와줘요!

translation.en: -Help me! Get off of me! -[Marcus] Shut up!
Get off me! [screaming]
[Aris] Don't!
Attaboy. What do you have in mind?
I'm gonna tie you to a post and make you watch every day
translation.ko: 네놈을 기둥에 묶어놓고 매일 지켜보게 해줄게

translation.en: as she turns from a farm girl to a whore.
Marcus, my good man…
This all sounds nice,
but you're not gonna do anything.
Not until I split this sapling myself.
translation.ko: 이 싱싱한 계집은 내가 먼저 맛볼 거니까

translation.en: Then you may have her.
Then you can all have her.
-[Sam screams] -Get off her!
[Kora] Stop!
Stop.
Dessert. [chuckles maliciously] Perfect.
Definitely get her.
Please.
[commander] I will kill her.
Is that what you want? Huh?
Ah, look who decided to join us.
Kill her. Kill them both.
What are you waiting for? I gave you an order.
translation.ko: 뭘 꾸물대는 거야? 내 명령 들었잖아

translation.en: Kill this b…
We're gonna have to fight.
[man] Kora, you may need this.
I found it at the site of the crash.
I thought it was lost.
Our culture is not for such weapons.
I feared it could be dangerous.
You were right.
Thank you.
Where will you go?
There is someone, a general named Titus.
Once a hero of the Realm
who turned his own forces against those of the Motherworld.
Last I heard, he was still out there somewhere.
If I could find him and men for him to lead…
translation.ko: 그 장군과 그를 따를 사람들을 찾으면…

translation.en: Gunnar.
Last year, in Providence, you sold grain to the resistance.
Yes. I met a man there who introduced me to the insurgents.
The Bloodaxes.
-Would he still know how to find them? -It's possible.
translation.ko: 그 남자가 또 찾아줄 수 있을까? 가능하지

translation.en: Then you'll take me to him?
Of course I will.
[Gunnar] Hey! Bring down one more uraki!
translation.ko: 어이! 유라키 한 마리 더 준비해!

translation.en: A general and an army?
We might stand a chance.
Be careful.
A safe journey… to the both of you.
translation.ko: 안전한 여행이 되길 두 사람 모두에게

translation.en: [Gunnar] So you were a soldier for the Motherworld?
Fighting for the Realm?
[Kora] You could say that.
Of high rank, I suppose?
I mean, are you wanted for desertion?
That and more.
Okay.
Anything else you wanna ask me?
[Gunnar] They won't just kill us, will they?
translation.ko: 우릴 막 죽일 리는 없지 않아?

translation.en: I mean, I understand making an example of Sindri
to keep us in line.
But we're just farmers, we're not a threat.
How can you know they will destroy us?
translation.ko: 우릴 다 죽일 거라고 어떻게 확신해?

translation.en: When they first came to my world, I was nine years old.
They never asked for anything.
There were no terms.
[Kora] Only the lust for destruction.
The Motherworld's forces were commanded by a young general named Balisarius,
translation.ko: 마더월드의 군대를 이끌고 온 발리사리우스라는 젊은 장군은

translation.en: who relished the ecstasy of combat.
The people of my world had mounted a brave defense,
translation.ko: 우리 세계 사람들은 용감히 맞서 싸웠는데

translation.en: but it had served only to enrage the young general
translation.ko: 오히려 그 젊은 장군의 분노만 더 키운 꼴이 됐고

translation.en: and gave him provocation to take out that anger on the innocent.
translation.ko: 아무 죄 없는 이들이 그 분노의 표적이 됐지

translation.en: I found myself face-to-face with Balisarius,
who loved commanding his troops,
not from the conning tower of his ships,
but on the battlefield itself.
[Kora] Balisarius killed my entire family and took me with him.
translation.ko: 발리사리우스는 내 가족을 모두 죽이고 날 데려갔어

translation.en: I don't know why he spared me.
Why, of the hundreds of thousands that died at his hands,
he chose me to live.
Saw something in me, I suppose.
Someone to share in his pain.
They gave me the name Arthelais,
began my training and education in the histories of the Motherworld.
And for five years, I lived on that ship with its soldiers,
translation.ko: 그리고 5년 동안 그 함선에서 살았어 내겐 그 안의 군인들이 가족이었지

translation.en: who were my only family.
No softness.
Only the hard lessons of war.
He took me often on missions of diplomacy,
and I was his child.
I was his protégé. I was his student.
I was one of them.
Daughter of a decorated commander.
Friend to the King and the royal family.
-Living a life of privilege. -[muted dialogue]
[Kora] But regardless of my social standing, I was expected to do my duty.
translation.ko: 하지만 사회적 지위가 높아도 의무는 다해야 했어

translation.en: To fight for the Motherworld.
At the Academy Militarium, they encouraged us to find a lover.
Someone we would defend with our lives
translation.ko: 그러면 목숨을 걸고 서로를 지켜야 할 테니까

translation.en: when the politics of expansion became too abstract,
and the why of the conquest was lost in sheer savagery of combat.
translation.ko: 극도로 야만적인 전투 속에 정복할 이유를 찾지 못할 때도

translation.en: Come on! Let's go! Come on!
[Kora] So, at the age of 18, I was made an officer and given a command.
translation.ko: 나는 18살에 장교가 돼서 군대를 이끌게 됐어

translation.en: [Kora] I fought for the King on distant worlds
translation.ko: 나는 머나먼 세상에서 왕을 위해 싸웠어

translation.en: under the banner of a people who murdered my entire family
translation.ko: 내 가족을 몰살시키고 내 세상을 무너뜨린 이들을 위해

translation.en: and destroyed my world.
They had trained me,
broken me, and rebuilt me in their image.
translation.ko: 날 부숴버린 다음 그들의 모습으로 빚어냈어

translation.en: I'm only telling you this so you know who I am.
translation.ko: 내가 어떤 사람인지 알려주려고 얘기하는 거야

translation.en: You asked how I know that they'll destroy you.
translation.ko: 그들이 다 죽일 거란 걸 어떻게 확신하냐고 물었지?

translation.en: That's what I would do.
Hawkshaws.
Bounty hunters. They work for the Imperium.
Wait.
-[man screams] -[Gunnar] Oh, no.
That's our guy. That's the man we came to see.
translation.ko: 우리 저 사람 만나러 온 거야

translation.en: The one that introduced me to the Bloodaxes.
Did the Bloodaxes give you any other way to contact them?
translation.ko: 블러드액스 남매가 알려준 다른 연락 방법은 없어?

translation.en: No. They said they were sheltered on a planet called Sharaan.
translation.ko: 없어, 샤란이라는 행성에서 숨어 지낸다고만 했어

translation.en: -Protected by a king named Levitica. -Levitica.
translation.ko: 그들을 보호해 주는 왕의 이름이 - 레비티카… - 레비티카겠군

translation.en: Come.
Carbost.
Anyway, I think our best chance to find the Bloodaxes
is to contact the Leviticans.
[Kora] It might expose us.
First we find General Titus, then we'll see about your rebels.
translation.ko: 타이투스 장군부터 찾고 그 남매에 대해 생각해 보자

translation.en: Is this your owner?
Move on. He's not for sale.
Everything's for sale in this place, so… [inhales sharply] how much?
translation.ko: 여긴 돈이면 다 되는 곳이야 불러봐

translation.en: You know, I have a room upstairs…
…with relatively clean sheets.
That's a very generous offer. But I don't think so…
I guarantee you, by morning,
you're gonna be begging me for more.
-I said, move on. -[scoffs]
-Come on, Mama. -[tense music plays]
-Whoa, whoa, whoa. -Let him come and play.
You need to leave.
Listen close, you jealous little bitch.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 이 욕심 많은 년아

translation.en: Now you listen close. I told you, you need to leave.
I'm looking for information.
Has anyone here heard of General Titus or know where he might be?
translation.ko: 타이투스 장군 소식을 들었거나 거취를 아는 사람 있습니까?

translation.en: Of course, General Titus.
Crazy bastard. Turned his own men on the Motherworld's forces [grunts]
translation.ko: 미친놈이지 자기 부대를 이끌고 마더월드 군에 등을 돌렸어

translation.en: at the Battle of Sarawu.
Do you know of his location?
Last I heard, he was fighting in the coliseum at Pollux.
I'd be careful if I were you, little miss.
Last hunter who went looking for him ended up with his head on a pike
translation.ko: 지난번에 찾으러 갔던 사냥꾼은 막대에 머리통이 꽂힌 채

translation.en: outside the coliseum entrance
as a warning not to bother him.
So, he's on Pollux.
-That's your plan? -That's my plan.
What?
Guess we need to find a ship to take us to Pollux.
You're catching on.
Hey! Bitch!
You should have killed me.
Now you're gonna die.
I'm gonna give you one chance to just turn and walk away.
translation.ko: 기회는 딱 한 번 준다 지금 돌아서서 나가

translation.en: Are you gonna give all of us one chance?
translation.ko: 기회를 한 번씩이나 주시게? 우리 모두한테?

translation.en: -Kill her. -[gun powers up]
Impressive.
[Kora] Were those Hawkshaws that paid you working for the Motherworld?
translation.ko: 너한테 돈 준 정탐꾼들 마더월드 쪽 놈들인가?

translation.en: -I don't like bounty hunters. -[man] I didn't ask.
translation.ko: - 나 현상금 사냥꾼 싫어해 - 안 물어봤는데

translation.en: And to be clear, I don't like bounty hunters either.
translation.ko: 분명히 말하지만 현상금 사냥꾼은 나도 싫어

translation.en: [Kora] So you're a gun for hire?
No. That's not my thing.
I'm more of an opportunist, you might say.
A real hero, huh?
Wait.
Look. I heard you in there,
trying to get to Pollux.
I could help you.
Oh, understand, we're just simple farmers.
We're searching for soldiers for a fight against the Motherworld.
We have some money, but this is not the one you get rich on.
translation.ko: 돈이 없진 않지만 큰돈 만질 수 있는 일은 아니야

translation.en: Aye, I understand.
Still, pay me what it's worth to you.
Soldiers for a fight against the Motherworld?
Well, my name's Kai.
Come on, my ship's down at port.
Right. Setting course for Pollux.
[Kai] I need to stop on Neu-Wodi first.
You know, there's a rancher there.
He has a man that might just work out for you.
translation.ko: 당신네 일에 딱 맞을 사람을 데리고 있거든

translation.en: Is he worth our time?
Because we can't afford to waste any.
I think you'll like him.
You ever been off-planet?
No. What did you do on the farm?
I oversee the harvest, and planting, cataloguing seeds, and making sure that…
translation.ko: 수확물이랑 농사 전반을 관리하고 씨앗 분류하고, 항상 모든…

translation.en: That sounds great. You might want to hold on.
translation.ko: 멋지네, 꽉 잡는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: Come in.
Oh, Cassius, it's you. Good.
[Cassius] We received a communiqué from the Hawkshaws.
They're requesting to rendezvous with us.
Apparently they've captured a creature
translation.ko: 반란군에 대해 중요한 정보를 아는 놈을

translation.en: that has important information about the insurgents,
translation.ko: 반란군에 대해 중요한 정보를 아는 놈을 잡아놓은 모양입니다

translation.en: Devra Bloodaxe and her brother.
Bloodaxe? Huh.
-Well, that… -[creatures chitter]
That's excellent, Cassius.
Inform me when they arrive.
-[Cassius] Yes, sir. -Hey.
Well, if it isn't the bastard from Saaldorun.
translation.ko: 아, 이게 누구야? 살도런의 후레자식이 납셨구만

translation.en: -What brings you all the way out here? -I missed your smiling face.
You still got that man chained in the back?
Tarak? Yeah, he's working off his debt to me.
translation.ko: 타라크? 그럼, 아직 빚을 못 갚았거든

translation.en: Another couple dozen seasons, we should be square.
translation.ko: 20해쯤 더 부려 먹으면 다 받을 수 있으려나

translation.en: What's it to you?
You mind if we talk to him?
Could be a deal in it for ya.
Well, if there's money to be made…
Hey!
Hey! Tarak!
[man] These people want to talk to you.
-What got that chain on your leg? -[Tarak] A long road of mistakes.
translation.ko: 어쩌다 쇠고랑 신세가 됐지? 수많은 실수 탓이지

translation.en: But if you're here to accuse me of crimes against the Motherworld,
translation.ko: 마더월드에 대한 죄를 물으러 온 거라면

translation.en: I'm guilty as charged. Take it up with him.
translation.ko: 다 유죄 맞으니까 저 사람하고 얘기해

translation.en: No. That's not why we're here.
We're here from a small village, and we're looking to hire some fighters
translation.ko: 우린 한 작은 마을에서 왔는데 마더월드의 군대에 맞서도록 우릴 훈련하고 보호해 줄

translation.en: to train and protect us against a force from the Motherworld.
translation.ko: 마더월드의 군대에 맞서도록 우릴 훈련하고 보호해 줄 전사들을 고용하려고 하거든

translation.en: -I'm no friend of the Realm. -Okay.
[Tarak] That's well-known.
And I'd gladly fight with you,
but… I have a debt on my name, and I honor my debts.
translation.ko: 내겐 빚이 있고 난 빚은 꼭 갚는 사람이라서

translation.en: What's he owe you?
300,000 Darams ought to cover any inconvenience I've suffered.
translation.ko: 30만 다람 정도면 그간의 마음고생에 위안이 될 것 같은데

translation.en: Oh, ya bollocks.
We don't have that kind of money.
No money.
Well, I do love to gamble.
Here we go.
What's the bet?
If Tarak can break that creature out there, his debts are squared with me.
translation.ko: 타라크가 저 밖의 짐승을 길들일 수 있으면 탕감해 주지

translation.en: [man] But if he don't ride him,
you all get a chain and a shackle.
That's the deal.
[man] Grab it tighter!
Watch its tail!
Can you ride him?
Yeah… I can ride him.
[man] Yank it hard! Don't let him fight you like that!
translation.ko: 세게 당겨! 발버둥 못 치게 하라고!

translation.en: Drop your leads.
She'll tear you apart.
Drop your leads and clear out now.
Suit yourself. Drop them.
[in Samandrait] I'm not going to hurt you.
You're far from home and so am I.
See, you and I…
…we are alike.
We've been hurt. Betrayed.
Our trust has been broken.
We both know fear.
Yet, the biggest fear we both face…
…is the fear of ourselves.
[in English] That's it.
[in Samandrait] Let's show them we're not afraid.
Let's show them we're more than the shackles that bind us.
translation.ko: '우릴 옥죄는 쇠고랑 따위 아무것도 아니란 걸 보여주자'

translation.en: [in English] Easy. Easy. Easy. Let's go. Let's go.
There.
Yeah.
It's okay.
Hickman, I've done as you asked.
Your debt is square with me.
Be good to her.
[men] Go! Get out!
No. Hey.
No. No.
Attagirl.
[Gunnar] Tarak! Let's go.
This was good. Anyone else you know of along the way?
translation.ko: 소득이 있었어 가는 길에 데려갈 사람 또 없어?

translation.en: I might have a couple ideas.
[woman] So, what's the job?
We represent a village on a small moon called Veldt.
translation.ko: 벨트라는 작은 위성의 한 마을 대표로 왔어

translation.en: This village faces the threat of annihilation
by the armies of the Motherworld.
We are looking for warriors
to join the fight to protect them.
With your reputation,
we thought it might be something you'd be interested in.
translation.ko: 그 일에 관심을 보일 것 같더라고

translation.en: -Nemesis, please, please. -Hold her.
Help her. Please, please.
[Harmada] Stay back.
I just want to talk. That's all.
I'm clearly distressed, that's true.
But I'm not stupid.
I know why you're here. You want the child.
Yes, I do.
[Harmada] You can't have this one.
This one is mine.
She has a mother who's waiting for her.
Who's missing her.
And why should I care about that mother's pain
translation.ko: 내가 그 어미의 고통을 신경 써야 하나?

translation.en: when no one is here for my pain?
-[child whimpers] -This was my home before they came.
Taste the air.
It's poisoned my body.
It weakens my eggs, and now, my children cannot emerge.
translation.ko: 이 공기 때문에 내 알들이 병들어서 내 아이들은 세상에 못 나와

translation.en: I deserve justice.
[Nemesis] I understand.
But this is not the way.
There is a difference between justice and revenge.
Is there?
I'm not so sure.
I know a mother's pain.
I know the loneliness of that pain.
But you can't hurt that child.
translation.ko: 하지만 넌 그 애를 해칠 수 없어

translation.en: I won't let you.
I believe you. But understand.
translation.ko: 네 말 믿어 근데 이건 알아둬

translation.en: -I will kill this child. -[child sobs]
And I will keep killing until every mother weeps tears of regret
translation.ko: 그리고 계속 죽일 거야 모든 어미들이 눈물 흘리며

translation.en: for ever having come to the mines of Daggus.
translation.ko: 다구스의 광산에 온 걸 후회할 때까지

translation.en: Shit!
Come on.
Let's go.
Come. Back up! Back up!
-[child whimpers] -Come here.
Wow. That was…
That was amazing.
Do not celebrate this.
There's no honor in this.
This could easily be any of you lying here
translation.ko: 당신들 중 누구라도 이런 꼴이 될 수 있어

translation.en: in the gutter of some forgotten world,
in the name of revenge.
You would do well to remember that.
That was good of you earlier. With the child.
translation.ko: 아까 진짜 잘했어 아이 구한 거

translation.en: -I was just trying to help. -Yes, but it's not natural for some.
translation.ko: 그냥 도운 것뿐이야 누구나 그렇게 나서진 않아

translation.en: [Gunnar] It is for you.
Back home, you saved Sam without hesitation.
Kindness is a virtue worth dying for.
translation.ko: 선량함이란 목숨을 걸고 지킬 만한 가치지

translation.en: I believe that.
I didn't always.
I told you how I fought on countless worlds.
Well, word of my victories reached my adopted father.
translation.ko: 내가 승승장구한다는 소식이 날 입양한 아버지에게 닿았어

translation.en: And the King.
[Kora] For my loyalty and service,
I was promoted to the Elite Guard of the Royal Family.
The appointment was engineered by my father.
I couldn't have known it was something more.
translation.ko: 뭔가 더 있다는 걸 나로선 알 수가 없었지

translation.en: I was given the honor
of being the bodyguard to Princess Issa.
The princess was named after an ancient Queen Issa,
translation.ko: 이사 공주의 이름은 옛 여왕의 이름을 딴 거야

translation.en: the Lifegiver.
In the old stories of the queen,
it was said that she had the power to give life.
translation.ko: 그 여왕에겐 생명을 주는 능력이 있었대

translation.en: It seemed a myth or a metaphor
created in response to the generations of war and conquest.
translation.ko: 전쟁과 정복의 시간 속에 만들어진 이야기 말이야

translation.en: Yet, the story still captured the imagination of the people.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 이야기는 사람들의 상상력을 자극했고

translation.en: And it was believed that the princess, my princess, might have that same power.
translation.ko: 다들 내가 지키던 공주가 같은 능력을 지녔을 거라고 믿었어

translation.en: I saw on more than one occasion things that I… couldn't explain.
translation.ko: 나도 몇 번이나 직접 봤어 말도 안 되는 광경을

translation.en: Things that made me think that she was different.
Special.
The King once said to me…
When she becomes queen,
I believe she'll bring a compassion that I've lost
translation.ko: 내가 이 길고 힘든 전쟁을 겪으며 놓치고 만

translation.en: after all these hard years of war.
translation.ko: 공감의 시대를 다시 열 수 있을 거야

translation.en: [Kora] "It will be the dawn of something better."
translation.ko: - 더 나은 세상이 시작될 거다 - 더 나은 세상이 시작될 거라고

translation.en: -I think your friendship makes her safer. -That our friendship made her safer.
translation.ko: - 너희 우정이 그 애를 지킬 거야 - 우리 우정이 공주를 지킬 거라고

translation.en: I believed in her.
In her kindness.
I believed in her ability to save us.
translation.ko: 공주가 우릴 구원할 능력을 지녔다고 믿었어

translation.en: The great General Titus.
Thank you.
[Gunnar] Okay.
Are you sure this is a good idea?
Let's clean him up and get him sober.
-Yeah, that'll do it. -[Tarak] Come on.
-[Gunnar] Come on. -[Kai] You got him.
-[Tarak] Come on. -Get off me! [yells]
What do you think you're doing?
That's enough. Thank you.
Did you command the Eastern ranks for the Old King?
Are you not General Titus? A legend.
I don't know what you're running your mouth about.
Why can't you just leave me alone?
Because my best hope is that long-ago general is still in front of me.
translation.ko: 지금 내 유일한 희망이 오래전의 그 장군이 내 눈앞에 있다는 거니까

translation.en: What do you want from me?
My men are dead because of my surrender.
translation.ko: 내가 투항하는 바람에 부하들이 다 죽었어

translation.en: I'm tired of reliving that nightmare every day.
translation.ko: 난 매일 그 악몽 속에 몸부림치며 살아

translation.en: Now, please, leave me and let me die in peace.
translation.ko: 제발 나 좀 내버려둬 조용히 죽고 싶어

translation.en: I don't think you're meant to die here…
General.
Stop calling me that.
I have no rank, no privilege.
I'm here to make you an offer.
To give you a chance at redemption.
-I am beyond redemption. -I have no time for pity!
translation.ko: - 속죄로 씻길 죄가 아니야 - 당신 달래줄 시간 없어!

translation.en: What about all the dead men you once commanded?
What about them?
If not redemption,
what about revenge?
This is the man who knows where the insurgents are?
It is, sir.
Well, I'm listening.
You'll let me go if I tell you what I know?
I'll set you free, you have my word.
I haven't seen Devra Bloodaxe for a full season,
translation.ko: 데브라 블러드액스를 본 건 꼬박 한 해 전입니다

translation.en: but at the time they were on Sharaan, under the protection of a king called…
translation.ko: 하지만 그 당시 샤란에서 어느 왕의 보호를 받고 있었어요

translation.en: Levitica.
[Noble] Go on.
This was some time ago, but they were definitely there.
translation.ko: 시간이 지나긴 했지만 분명 거기 있었습니다

translation.en: Talk to him, to Levitica.
I certainly will. Thank you.
Thought we had a deal!
Yes, we did.
You're free.
[Noble] Dissect his brain and see if we can find out any more information.
translation.ko: 뇌를 적출해서 정보가 더 있는지 뒤져봐

translation.en: Then we'll go pay our respects to King Levitica.
[Cassius] Yes, Admiral. I'll set a course for Sharaan.
Let's go.
[in Sharaanese] Your patience is appreciated and I can assure you…
…Devra is aware of your presence.
A decision when to receive you is imminent.
translation.ko: '언제 만날 수 있을지 곧 결정될 거요'

translation.en: Thank you, Levitica, honored king.
We await their arrival.
-[distant boom] -[Gunnar in English] Look.
Farmer, why would you contact us from this unknown and flagless vessel?
translation.ko: 농부 정체 모를 우주선을 타고 나타나 우릴 만나자고 한 이유는?

translation.en: I was assuming we had a level of trust after our last meeting.
translation.ko: 지난번 만난 후로 신뢰가 좀 쌓였다고 생각하는데

translation.en: We bought your grain to feed our fighters.
translation.ko: 우린 전사들에게 먹일 식량을 샀을 뿐이야

translation.en: Do not confuse your business of commerce with our business of revolution.
translation.ko: 당신 일은 곡식 장사잖아 우리가 하는 혁명과는 전혀 다른 일이지

translation.en: [Gunnar] I understand.
Your coming here is a great risk to us all and to our benefactor.
translation.ko: 당신이 여기 오면 우리 모두가 위험해지고 우릴 돕는 분도 위험해져

translation.en: But we are no longer in need of your grain.
translation.ko: 그런데 이제 당신네 식량은 필요하지 않아

translation.en: King Levitica's kindness has been more than enough to sustain us,
translation.ko: 레비티카 왕의 배려 덕에 모두 충분히 잘 먹고 있거든

translation.en: so I suggest you leave immediately.
[Kora] We're not here to sell grain.
Gunnar's village was visited by a Dreadnought
that threatens its very existence.
I have recruited these warriors
and given my word to bring them back and defend the farmers.
-But we're running out of time. -What?
This handful? Against a Dreadnought?
That's why we have come. You have men and ships.
translation.ko: 그래서 찾아온 거야 군대와 전투선이 있잖아

translation.en: With you we could mount a real defense.
translation.ko: 당신들이 도와주면 제대로 방어할 수 있어

translation.en: And, of course, we can pay you with the surplus from our harvest.
translation.ko: 물론 잉여 수확물로 대가는 지불할 거야

translation.en: It's all we've got.
[Devra] My forces against the King's Gaze?
That's suicide.
That ship cannot be destroyed by a few dozen fighters.
translation.ko: 전투선 몇십 대로 상대할 수 있는 함선이 아니야

translation.en: That ship and the men aboard it are world destroyers.
translation.ko: 그 함선과 그 안의 군인들은 세상을 파괴하는 자들이야

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's impossible.
[Kora] This man is not a revolutionary.
He's a simple farmer.
But commerce or not,
his people toiled with their bare hands to grow the grain that fed you.
translation.ko: 이 사람들이 맨손으로 땅을 일궈 길러낸 곡식으로 배를 채웠잖아

translation.en: All of you!
And because of that transaction,
their village is now threatened by Admiral Noble,
translation.ko: 그 마을은 노블 제독에게 위협받고 있어

translation.en: in pursuit of your revolution.
I see.
I will go.
Thank you.
Brother, a word.
Our victories, what few there have been, have been tactical ones.
translation.ko: 몇 번 되지 않는 우리의 승리는 모두 전략적인 접근 덕분이었어

translation.en: We cannot fight in the open against the King's Gaze.
translation.ko: 킹스게이즈를 상대로 전면전을 벌일 순 없어

translation.en: If the farmer found us, it won't be long before Noble does.
translation.ko: 저 농부가 우릴 찾았다면 노블도 곧 들이닥칠 거야

translation.en: And I will not allow another world to fall in our name.
translation.ko: 그리고 다시는 그 어떤 세상도 우리 때문에 무너지게 두지 않아

translation.en: And what of those you command?
[Darrian] Their lives are theirs.
These people, they've come to us with
nowhere else to turn.
They come…
…seeking our help…
…to stand against a Dreadnought of the Motherworld.
Is that not what we stand for?
Are they not who we once were?
If we will not stand with these defiant farmers to protect their home,
then the revolution is meaningless.
Under free will,
who among you is willing to die for what we believe
translation.ko: 신념 뒤에 숨기보다 신념을 위해 죽는 쪽을 택할 자가

translation.en: rather than hide behind it?
[Darrian] Milius.
Why am I not surprised?
Who is going to make sure you'll return in one piece, if not me?
translation.ko: 대장을 무사히 데리고 오려면 당연히 내가 가야죠

translation.en: Thank Levitica and leave this planet.
translation.ko: 레비티카에게 감사 인사 전하고 이 행성을 떠나

translation.en: Sister, until we meet again.
Maybe this isn't suicide after all.
Why would he agree to help you?
Bloodaxe? You think they shouldn't?
translation.ko: 블러드액스? 그자가 잘못 판단한 것 같아?

translation.en: It just seems short-sighted.
I mean, he weakens what little of
whatever word you wanna use for it there is…
Resistance, insurgency.
For what, Kora?
The chance to get obliterated by a Dreadnought?
Guilt, it's a powerful thing.
[Kai] Aye, guilt. The underbelly of honor.
I think I might've had that once.
Honor.
Would you believe that?
It's true.
I mean, what do you figure?
I got ten, fifteen more seasons at most, before I steal from the wrong man.
translation.ko: 난 아마 길어야 열에서 열다섯 해 안에 뒤통수칠 인간을 잘못 고르거나

translation.en: Get stabbed to death by some dog-headed son of a bitch in a bar fight.
translation.ko: 술집에서 웬 무식한 놈이랑 싸우다가 칼 맞아 죽을 거야

translation.en: It's really your fault, anyway.
Makin' me wanna be an honorable man.
If you had more resisting power to speak of,
you wouldn't need me to join you so badly.
You're willing to fight with us?
Since you're beggin'.
Kai, we're not.
Well, since you're asking, then.
If you'll allow me.
There is one complication.
The shite in the cargo hold.
I got buyers waiting in Gondival.
Aren't the kinds known for their patience.
Might be wise to sever my ties to life as a thief
before we go picking a fight with a Dreadnought.
translation.ko: 도둑 생활은 청산하는 게 좋을 것 같은데

translation.en: Besides, you said yourself you need me.
-I did not say that. -I think you did.
translation.ko: 그런 말 안 했어 한 것 같은데

translation.en: I'll set the course and let 'em know we're on our way.
Oh, shit, does that make me one of the good guys?
translation.ko: 그럼 나도 이제 착한 놈이 되는 건가?

translation.en: [in Sharaanese] I beg you…
[in English] Please!
I've told you the truth.
I have nothing more.
[Noble] Right.
[scoffs] The truth…
…that you took them in, known enemies of the Motherworld,
mended their wounds, repaired their broken ships,
translation.ko: 상처를 치료해 주고 고장 난 전투선을 고쳐줬다고

translation.en: all out of your moral code of honor and charity.
translation.ko: 명예와 베풂을 중요시하는 당신네 신념에 따라서 말이야

translation.en: Our civilization has lived and thrived for 10,000 years
translation.ko: 우리 문명은 1만 년 동안 번영 속에 살아오면서

translation.en: with honor and charity as its most valued tenets.
translation.ko: 명예와 베풂을 최고의 덕목으로 생각해 왔습니다

translation.en: Yes. Yes, honor and charity.
Do you see that?
That ship is named the King's Gaze.
It was named to honor our slain father.
translation.ko: 시해되신 지도자의 명예를 기려 지어진 이름이지

translation.en: So…
honor I understand.
Charity, I do not.
Our King showed charity to an off-worlder like yourself
translation.ko: 너 같은 변방의 무리에게 베풀며 사신 왕께서

translation.en: and was slaughtered for his charity.
So, we named the ship to remind us of the power in that benevolent gaze
translation.ko: 함선의 이름을 그렇게 지은 건 잊지 않기 위해서야 베풀다가 꺼져버린 그 관대한 눈길 속에

translation.en: that was lost to charity.
And to remember that, if by God's will, that gaze should fall upon us and be held,
translation.ko: 그리고 기억하기 위해서지 신의 뜻으로 그 눈길이 우리에게 닿아

translation.en: for even the briefest of moments,
it could change your life forever.
translation.ko: 우리 삶은 완전히 달라질 거라는 것을

translation.en: Today, it falls upon you.
We are cleared to engage.
-[systems beep] -Confirmed.
[commander] Fire at will.
[Cassius] Sir, we received a message from one of our Hawkshaws.
They're closing in on the Bloodaxes.
Finally, some good news.
Well, prepare the hyperlaunch.
I'll go ahead and personally retrieve the treasonous dogs myself.
translation.ko: 주인에게 저항한 개들을 직접 거둬들이러 가야겠어

translation.en: And what orders for the King's Gaze, sir?
Well, once you've razed the planet,
we'll rendezvous, extract the exact location of the rest of the insurgents,
translation.ko: 나머지 반란군의 위치를 정확히 파악한 다음

translation.en: and destroy them once and for all.
[Cassius] Yes, sir.
[Gunnar] I'm pretty sure Kai said these boxes.
translation.ko: 카이가 말한 게 이 상자들일 거예요

translation.en: -[Titus] We've got one. -[Gunnar] Okay.
Aye, just take the gray ones.
-They're all marked. -All right.
For God's sake, don't look inside. I'd hate you to think less of me.
translation.ko: 절대 열어보지는 마 날 경멸하게 될 테니까

translation.en: Where do you want them?
-There's space behind the bridge. -Done.
All right, put them the other side of the bridge.
Aye, let's unload and get off this godforsaken rock.
translation.ko: 얼른 내려놓고 이 재수 없는 행성 뜨자고

translation.en: I'll be happy to leave this life behind.
Good.
[Hawkshaw] Just wanna make sure that one's on the manifest.
[Darrian] Pilots!
Once you tie off those ships, see if you can get some fuel.
translation.ko: 계선 작업 끝내면 연료 채울 방법 찾아봐

translation.en: And you two, keep eyes from above!
How we lookin'?
Everything is done.
-[Kai] All right, let's move. -[Hawkshaw] Yes.
-[comms beeps] -On your mark.
This isn't right.
On your knees.
Now is not the time to be a hero.
When?
[Kai] On Veldt, in Providence, the first time I heard your story.
translation.ko: 벨트의 프로비던스에서 네 얘길 처음 들었을 때

translation.en: Thought with your ideals of resistance I could round up a couple of heads.
translation.ko: 네가 빠져 있는 그 이상 덕에 몇 놈 더 잡을 수 있겠더라고

translation.en: Tarak for instance.
His world enslaved.
translation.ko: 저 친구의 세상은 전부 노예가 됐거든

translation.en: Then there was Nemesis.
Her whole family slaughtered.
But General Titus?
Have you any idea how much he alone is worth?
translation.ko: 저놈 목 하나에 얼마가 걸려 있는지 알아?

translation.en: They would've all jumped at the chance to exact any small vengeance against the Realm.
translation.ko: 왕국에 복수할 수 있다면 당장 나설 놈들이지

translation.en: Even if the payment was only a sack of grain.
translation.ko: 곡식 한 자루만 준대도 기꺼이 나섰을 거야

translation.en: Then there was you. Kora.
Or should I call you Arthelais?
The biggest prize of them all.
Do you know what the Motherworld did to my planet?
translation.ko: 마더월드가 내 행성에 무슨 짓을 했는지 알아?

translation.en: They didn't just destroy it.
They tortured every man, woman, and child.
translation.ko: 남자, 여자, 아이 가릴 것 없이 모두를 고문했어

translation.en: Left them clingin' to life as they turned them to ash from low orbit.
translation.ko: 살려달라고 비는 사람들을 잿더미로 만들어 버렸지

translation.en: You know what that taught me?
Never set foot on the wrong side of history.
translation.ko: 역사 속 패자의 길로는 절대 가면 안 된다

translation.en: [Kora] Is that what you think we're doing?
[Kai] No.
You've chosen the side that doesn't even make it to the history books.
translation.ko: 너희는 역사책에 등장조차 못 할 길을 가고 있어

translation.en: What happened to honor?
What did happen to it?
Piece of shit.
Well, who all have we got here?
Who indeed?
Commander Bloodaxe.
Leader of the very insurgency
the King's Gaze was sent to this backwater of the galaxy to capture.
translation.ko: 킹스게이즈가 이 은하계의 벽오지까지 출동하게 만들었지

translation.en: He alone will secure my seat in the Senate.
I would be remiss if I failed to mention we are in the presence of royalty.
translation.ko: 왕족께서 행차해 주셨는데 모른 척하면 안 되겠지?

translation.en: Tarak Decimus.
Or should I say Prince Tarak? [scoffs]
General Titus.
Needs no introduction, does he?
His actions at the Battle of Sarawu precede him.
The farmer.
The ambitious farmer.
I pride myself on never being surprised.
translation.ko: 내가 원래 뭘 봐도 안 놀라는 사람인데

translation.en: And yet, here I am.
I understand why all of them are here… but you.
translation.ko: 저것들이 여기 있는 건 다 이해가 되는데 넌 뭘까?

translation.en: What could you have possibly hoped to gain by mounting such a… feeble stand?
translation.ko: 대체 무슨 부귀영화를 누리겠다고 위험한 짓을 했을까?

translation.en: Tell me.
Oh, yes.
The legendary swordswoman known only by the name of Nemesis.
Assassinated 16 high-ranking Imperial officers
and their security details.
All in a hunt to avenge her slaughtered children.
translation.ko: 학살당한 자식들에 대한 복수를 하겠답시고 말이야

translation.en: [Noble] Of course.
Now I thought I recognized something in you,
down in that filthy village.
Out there, amongst all those simple people,
the most wanted fugitive in the known universe.
translation.ko: 온 우주에서 가장 악명 높은 수배자가 있었다니

translation.en: Scargiver. Arthelais.
Do you know what you've done for me, Arthelais, truly?
translation.ko: 네가 날 위해 뭘 해준 건지 아나?

translation.en: Assembling yourself as such?
When I lay your bodies at the foot of the Regent,
translation.ko: 섭정 왕의 발밑에 네놈들 시체를 바치는 순간

translation.en: I'll be a hero of the Realm.
They'll write songs of my feats of courage.
It's not like I didn't do all the work.
Let's move this along, shall we?
Let's transport them paralyzed, in case anyone's feeling frisky.
translation.ko: 누구 하나 허튼짓하면 안 되니까 마취해서 데려갑시다

translation.en: On your feet. I've got a job for you.
Look… [grunts] Okay, okay.
You play your cards right, you at least might make it out of this alive.
translation.ko: 똑똑하게 처신만 잘하면 목숨은 건질 수 있을 거야

translation.en: You're sick.
And you're a coward.
[Kai] All you have to do is pull the trigger.
[Gunnar] I won't do it.
[Kai] Yes, you will.
You can do it. Just pull the trigger.
-I know you're in love with her. -[Gunnar sighs]
Kora.
[Kora whimpers] Gunnar.
I'm so sorry.
You can do it.
Pilots! To your ships!
[pilot] Cut me loose! We gotta go!
[screaming] No!
This is perfect.
They gave their lives for us.
They believed in their cause.
What better thing to die for?
And I should have died with them.
I know a thing or two about
the guilt of carrying on when those you've sworn to fight with are gone.
translation.ko: 함께 싸우기로 맹세했던 이들이 전사했을 때의 그 죄책감 말이야

translation.en: Honor them.
With everything that you can from now.
translation.ko: 네가 할 수 있는 모든 방법을 동원해서

translation.en: Carry them.
This was a blow to the Motherworld, what we did this day.
translation.ko: 우리는 오늘 마더월드에 제대로 한 방 날렸다

translation.en: Criminals, nobodies, standing against a machine of war.
translation.ko: 범죄자들, 힘없는 자들이 막강 전쟁 병기에 맞서 이겼어

translation.en: This small act of defiance gives voice to the voiceless.
translation.ko: 이 작은 저항의 움직임이 침묵하는 자들에게 목소리를 줄 것이다

translation.en: This is more than just a fallen prick officer and some of his men.
translation.ko: 우린 그저 재수 없는 장교 놈과 그 부하들을 무너뜨린 게 아니야

translation.en: It's the beginning of something.
What will they do now?
The crews of the Imperium are not known for their bravery.
After the death of an admiral, protocol will demand the ship's return.
That's good.
We still get paid, I presume?
[Kora] A deal is a deal.
Payment awaits us on Veldt.
translation.ko: 벨트에 가면 받을 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: I owe you thanks, Gunnar. You know, I never did trust that pilot.
translation.ko: 고마워, 군나르 사실 그 조종사 처음부터 찜찜했어

translation.en: [Kora] We all owe him thanks.
He saved us.
[Titus] I've been wondering.
Is what that dead bounty hunter said true?
translation.ko: 그 죽은 현상금 사냥꾼이 한 말 사실인가?

translation.en: That you're Arthelais?
Kai was a liar and a thief who nearly sold you all for a profit.
translation.ko: 카이는 우릴 다 팔아넘기려 했던 거짓말쟁이에 도둑이에요

translation.en: Anything more you want, General?
Don't call me General.
Hey, you see it?
There.
That's our village.
Home.
[Kora] Home.
I never had a place to put to the word.
translation.ko: 그렇게 부를 만한 곳은 지금껏 없었는데

translation.en: It's almost a shame you killed that son-of-a-bitch Noble
translation.ko: 노블 그 개자식을 죽이는 바람에 싸울 필요가 없어진 게

translation.en: and we don't have to fight.
This would've been a beautiful place to die.
translation.ko: 이렇게 아름다운 곳에서 죽는 것도 괜찮았을 텐데

translation.en: Yes, it would.
Let's go.
[technician 1] Ready him for transmission.
Balisarius is standing by.
[technician 2] Sir, should we stabilize him first?
[technician 1] No, we will not keep the Regent waiting.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 섭정 왕을 기다리게 할 순 없다

translation.en: Neurolink.
-[cable clicks] -[technician 2] Link is established.
[technician1] Connection complete.
Signal is strong.
[technician 1] Send him.
Master.
Balisarius.
I have found her.
I have found Arthelais.
The Scargiver.
-You're certain it's her? -I am, my Lord.
She was in the company of the disgraced General Titus and Darrian Bloodaxe.
translation.ko: 우리 군의 수치인 타이투스 장군과 다리안 블러드액스와 함께였습니다

translation.en: We are close to capturing them.
Tell me, Commander. Did you think that this would be good news?
translation.ko: 어디 말해봐라 이게 좋은 소식일 거라고 생각했나?

translation.en: That my daughter, Arthelais,
one of the most dangerous and decorated warriors
translation.ko: 군 역사상 가장 위험하고 실력 있는 전사인 그 애가

translation.en: in the history of armed conflict, is now part of a blossoming insurgency?
translation.ko: 군 역사상 가장 위험하고 실력 있는 전사인 그 애가 세력을 키워가는 반란군과 합세했다는 소식이 말이야

translation.en: I'm supposed to be happy
that she's joined forces with the genius battlefield commander, General Titus?
translation.ko: 그 아이가 천재적인 사령관 타이투스 장군과 손을 잡았다는 얘길 듣고?

translation.en: Sir, she is within our grasp.
Let me bring you her head.
[Balisarius] In truth, I fear the head most endangered here is yours.
translation.ko: 지금 제일 위태로운 건 네 머리인 것 같은데

translation.en: You will crush this insurgency to the last man, do you hear me?
translation.ko: 반란군을 한 사람도 빠짐없이 몰살해야 할 것이다

translation.en: And then you will capture my daughter alive
and bring back my precious child to me.
translation.ko: 나의 귀한 아이를 내 앞에 데려오도록

translation.en: So that I may crucify her in the shadow of the Senate.
If you cannot bring her to me,
then the one whose public execution
will send shivers down the spines of the senators,
and whose screams will echo down its marbled halls
translation.ko: 의회의 대리석 복도에 비명을 울릴 위인은

translation.en: will be yours.
[technician 1] Did he make it back?
[technician 2] I don't know.
I have no heartbeat or brain function.
[technician 1] Hit him with everything.
